product.name: Lotus & Windoware Cordless, 2 Inch Faux Wood Blind, 58" Wide x 48" Long, Window Blinds, Blinds & Shades, Blinds for Indoor Windows, Smooth, Bright White - 58" x 48",Bright White
product.description:
Enhance the elegance of your home with the timeless beauty of 2" Faux Wood Blinds in Bright White. These blinds for indoor windows offer a sophisticated yet functional design that seamlessly blends into any room, adding a touch of refinement to your décor. Crafted to impress, these faux wood blinds combine the charm of natural wood with the durability and low maintenance of synthetic materials. The Bright White finish brings a fresh, clean look that effortlessly complements any style, from modern to traditional.
Features include:
Effortless Light Control Adjust the slats with ease to create the perfect ambiance, balancing natural light and privacy.
Durable & Low Maintenance Built to last, these blinds are resistant to wear and require minimal upkeep, ideal for busy households.
Quick & Easy Installation Enjoy a hassle-free setup, transforming your windows in no time.
Upgrade your home with the 2" Faux Wood Blinds in Bright White—where style meets practicality for an elevated living space.
Superior Craftmanship
Our window blinds feature a heavy duty metal, low profile headrail designed for durability and sleek aesthetics.
Easy and Convenient Operation
Enjoy hassle-free adjustments with the easy control twisting wand that allows precise light control.
Room Darkening Slats Built to Last
These blinds feature premium room darkening, warp resistant, PVC Slats.
Valance
Featuring a 3 1/4" crown valance with 3/4" returns for that designer look.
Ideal for Any Home
These blinds for indoor windows are perfect for those looking to elevate their home's interior with style and practicality. Whether you need window blinds for your home or a specific space, our vinyl blinds offer the perfect solution.
Effortless Operation
Enjoy the convenience of window shades that raise and lower with a simple touch. The intuitive cordless design makes adjustments smooth and easy, offering precise light control and privacy with minimal effort.
Safety First
Ideal for homes with children and pets, our cordless window blinds eliminate the risk of tangled cords, providing a safer environment for your loved ones without compromising on style or performance.
Each of our window blinds is designed to provide a precise fit for your window. Please note that each blind will come with a 1/2 inch deduction to ensure a snug fit inside the window frame. As a result, the blind will be 1/2 inch smaller than the size listed in the product description.
How to Measure Your Window
To achieve the best fit, follow these measuring instructions carefully:

Installation Options
Our blinds are suitable for both inside and outside mounting of a window frame:

For more detailed instructions, refer to our measuring guide to ensure a perfect fit and professional look.
product.bullet_points:
• Engineered Wood (Pvc) Slats; Metal Headrail
• IMPORTANT! - This window blind is 57.5" wide to allow for mounting the blind inside a 58" wide window. Your blind will arrive to you exactly 57.5" wide. Our 2 Inch Faux Wood blinds are designed for a wide variety of window sizes and styles. Sizes stated within the product descriptions are listed by WIDTH then HEIGHT. See measuring instructions to ensure best fit.
• Stylish Design & Durability: These Bright White Faux Wood Blinds for indoor windows feature a sophisticated textured wood pattern, enhancing contemporary home decor with style and warmth. Crafted from durable 2-inch PVC faux wood slats, they offer a smooth, moisture-resistant finish that prevents warping, peeling, or staining, making them ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, dens, and kitchens.
• Effortless Control with Cordless Design: The cordless window blinds design is safe for homes with children and pets. Operate the blinds effortlessly with a simple touch. Adjusting the slat position is easy with the cordless wand tilt control. Simply turn the wand for privacy, room darkening, and light control.
• Designed for Your Living Space: For width, measure your window horizontally at the top, middle, and bottom, recording the narrowest measurement. Choose the closest size, which will come with a 1/2-inch deduction for a proper fit. For height, measure the longest vertical distance from top to bottom. The window shade can exceed your recorded measurement as the cordless feature allows the blind to stop at any position within the frame. Suitable for both Inside & Outside window mounting.
• Easy to Install & User Friendly: Faux Wood Blinds offer style and privacy, ideal for different room types such as living rooms, bedrooms, dens, and kitchens. They come complete with hardware and installation instructions for both inside and outside mounting. Each blind includes a 3 1/4" crown valance to provide the appearance of real wood blinds.
